abstract: Toronto Maple Leafs forward Leo Komarov earns three-game suspension from NHL after elbowing New York Rangers defenseman Ryan McDonagh, recently recovered from concussion, in head during game.

headline.print_headline: Suspension Issued for Elbow to McDonagh
headline.main: Maple Leafs’ Komarov Is Suspended for Hit to Rangers’ McDonagh

snippet: Leo Komarov elbowed Ryan McDonagh in the head Thursday, a day after McDonagh had returned from a concussion that caused him to miss four games.
lead_paragraph: Leo Komarov elbowed Ryan McDonagh in the head Thursday, a day after McDonagh had returned from a concussion that caused him to miss four games.
